metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33933 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability inApache Software Foundation Apache Traffic Server.This issue affects ApacheTraffic Server: from 8.0.0 through 9.2.0. 8.x users should upgrade to 8.1.7or later versions 9.x users should upgrade to 9.2.1 or later versions

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
